short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps your teacher maintain a great learning environment.

long.ar,de,es,fr,he,ja,ko,ru,zh_CN,zh_TW: This is the Web Helper extension for LanSchool.  It extends the capabilities of the LanSchool Student software.  This extension only works in a LanSchool classroom environment with LanSchool student software installed.
long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: This is the Web Helper extension for LanSchool.  It extends the capabilities of the LanSchool Student software.  This extension only works in a LanSchool classroom environment with LanSchool student software installed.  If the LanSchool Student software is not connected, this extension becomes dormant.
